backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining complaint management system with types (Complaint, SolutionUpdate, UserProfile), persistent state (complaints, solutions, userProfiles maps), access control integration, blob storage mixins, and admin bootstrap functionality for first-user-becomes-admin pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the logo replacement requirement (replacing flame-issue-tracker-logo.dim_512x512.png with FLAME COMPLAINTS logo image-6.png at 512x512 dimensions) with high confidence and associated test ID REQ-47.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities; describes routing, admin access control, complaint management UI, and authorization patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar components using OKLCH color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta, favicon link to generated 32x32 PNG, title 'FLAME Issue Tracker', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for complaint board, submission, detail, solutions, admin pages (landing, complaints, solutions, access-control), and whoami; wraps app in ThemeProvider and includes Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied UI implementing first-user-becomes-admin security pattern; shows bootstrap button when no admins exist or when user's principal matches expected admin but lacks access, with loading states, error handling, and principal copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard component that checks user role and only renders children for admin users, showing loading skeleton or access denied screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header containing logo image at /assets/generated/flame-issue-tracker-logo.dim_512x512.png, navigation links (Complaints, Solutions, Submit, Admin), PrincipalIndicator, login/logout button, mobile menu, ProfileSetupDialog, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Horizontal tabs component for filtering complaints by category (All plus categories from COMPLAINT_CATEGORIES taxonomy) with responsive wrapping and muted background styling.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintListIte: Renders a clickable card displaying a complaint summary with category, status, description, urgency level, and timestamp. Links to the detailed complaint view.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintSearchA: Provides search input and filter dropdowns (category, status, urgency) for complaints with a clear filters button. Manages filter state through props.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIndicat: Displays the authenticated user's principal ID in a dialog with copy-to-clipboard functionality and role information. Hidden for anonymous users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and optional email. Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/ProofUploadField: File upload component for complaint proof (images/PDFs up to 5MB) with validation, progress tracking, and preview/removal functionality using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Relate: Displays related categories as badges and related complaints as clickable links with external link icons.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Soluti: Card component displaying a solution update with title, description, timestamp, and related links section.
frontend/src/components/StatusTag.tsx: Renders a colored badge for complaint status (submitted, under review, in progress, resolved) with appropriate styling variants.
frontend/src/components/SubmitResultBann: Displays success or error alert banners with icons, title, and message after form submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with identity-based authentication, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Provides hooks to query the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor with caching and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerInfo.ts: React hook that fetches the current user's principal and role using TanStack Query, returning guest info when actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout using @dfinity/auth-client, managing identity state and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of TanStack Query hooks for user profiles, complaints (CRUD operations), and solutions, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using a professional university color scheme with warm accents.
frontend/src/lib/complaintTaxonomy.ts: Defines complaint categories (food services, academics, safety, etc.) with helper functions to map category enums to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessCont: Admin-only page that displays the allowlist of Principal IDs with administrator access. Provides copy-to-clipboard functionality for each principal and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminComplaints: Admin dashboard for managing all complaints with functionality to update status, toggle visibility (hide/unhide), and delete complaints. Includes confirmation dialog for deletions and displays complaint metadata.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin panel landing page with navigation cards linking to complaint management, solution management, and access control sections. Provides overview of admin capabilities for each section.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSolutionsP: Admin page component for creating and publishing solutions/updates with title, description, related categories, and related complaints selection. Uses form state management and toast notifications for success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintBoardPage.ts: Displays public complaints with category tabs, search/filter controls, and separates active from resolved complaints in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintDetailPage.t: Shows detailed view of a single complaint including description, status, urgency, timestamp, and supporting proof with back navigation.
Displays official solutions and updates to common issues using SolutionCard components with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitComplaintPage.t: Form page for authenticated users to submit complaints with category, description, urgency level, and optional proof upload. Includes validation, moderation error handling, and redirects to the complaint detail page on success.
frontend/src/pages/WhoAmIPage.tsx: Displays the current user's Internet Computer Principal ID and role (admin/user/guest) with copy-to-clipboard functionality. Shows debug information for admins and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence. Includes helper to remove sensitive parameters from URL hash without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with container settings, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking complaint tracking system for FLAME University with architectural notes about admin access, known issues with admin panel and authentication in production, and list of implemented features.
